answers.answer: Im sorry to hear you are going thru all this, as hard as it may sound , try and enjoy the last kicks, because your little one may surprise you anytime =), im 32wks and my kids and husband make su much fun of me for the way i walk, or give me looks when i sneeze, i cant deny i have thrown a shoe every now and then haha

question: I am 38+3 and so ready to have this Lil guy!!! Everything is swollen, I have gestational diabetes, asthma, a tilted cervix, fibroid tumors and weakness in my lower extremities I have also been diagnosed with bipolar disorder...on top of all this because I was already 22 weeks when I found out I was pregnant I didn't have the option for repeat c section or vbac...so now I'm just waiting to go into labor to see how everything goes for me...p.s. my ob/gyn is no help and has nothing positive to say about what I'm experiencing...is anyone else suffering like me??? This is so depressing and frustrating!!!
title: complications
